name: Shooter (ORV Studio)
description:
Hello !

The Game is Sci fi Robots Combat in open world In High REsolution Of Graphics!

You have one weapon to use and survive between enemies !

GEt YOur weapon from cliking on Q button and start the adventure!

Collect 8 box From the Game If you want to win !

I hope you will lik the game and leave a comment !
